item.title: Nigeria is A failed State: What Next?
item.description:
Officially a failed state, what next?

Nigeria’s situation is a laughable one. Imagine being led by a president who has quite a disturbing criminal record history.

Then, a vice president who allegedly has had dealings with Boko Haram.

Or the current Chief of Staff to the president select, a former head of the House of Representatives who was a convicted criminal in the United States.

Yikes.

Then, much recently, they appointed a criminal who looted Rivers’ state wealth and participated in the rigging of the elections on the President Select’s request, Nyesom Wike, as the Minister of Abuja.
